nodes.text: Amber-root was a type of cooking ingredient that could be diced. In 19 BBY, Jilka Zan Zentis, a worker at the Galactic Republic Treasury, diced amber-root in preparation for a meal while she was living in Kyrimorut, the home of the Mandalorian Skirata clan on the planet Mandalore.
Amber-root first appeared in Imperial Commando: 501st, a novel written by Karen Traviss and released in 2009 as a continuation of the Republic Commando series.
